website_summaries.verdict: A tough, no-nonsense hairbrush cleaner that specializes in efficiency, but you'll pay a premium for it.
pros: Durable metal rakes instead of bristles
Works quickly without needing to go over the same spot repeatedly
cons: Expensive compared to the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Good gadget to have!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nifty little gadget. I was very skeptical about paying $12 for something that I do with the comb, but it does work efficiently and in less time.
customer_reviews.author: Child of God

customer_reviews.title: It works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: This is just phenomenal. My hair brushes are usually way too covered with hair. Like really coarse and impossible to clean. I used this thing and it instantly removed all of the hair that had been stuck on my brush for months! It was really fun to use and I don't understand why more people don't own one of these. I will actually say it was like magic it worked so well! Definitely recommend to anyone thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Young

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Even though I do not use this tool to remove hair from my hair brush, it is a great tool to clean my drum carder. I recommend this tool for it's intended use and as a craft tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brush cleaner. Don't know what I did without it. (Yes I do. I did less well than I'm doing now.) I can zip through 5-6 brushes in only a minute or two with this cleaner when doing it by hand over the years used to take me forever, and I never did as good as a job as doing it with this device. You'll be happy you purchased this. Works with all shapes and sizes of brushes. (When you first run it through the brush, you might not think it's doing much, but just look at the end of the device and that's where you'll see the results.) GO for it!
customer_reviews.author: cybernurse

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING!!!!!!! I have a "thing" about loose hair, and clean my brushes after every use. Knowing this was coming for Christmas, I skipped a week of cleaning my daughter's brushes. The results are pictured. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tlq0726

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life.
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this contraption I never knew how effective it would be in cleaning my hair brush. Easy to use & cleans the hair from the brush easily. I absolutely love mine & I gave one to each of my 3 daughters as stocking stuffers for Christmas. They also claimed how easy it was to use & how effectively it cleaned their hair brush. Great product that I accidentally ran across searching for gifts for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Vic M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: love this product! I had been using the cheap little one that came with my porcupine brush. It fell apart so quick. I've never had this type of brush before so needing this kind of cleaning tool was new to me. I thought I didn't need to spend the extra money on a brush cleaning tool. Boy was I wrong! This brush cleaner is awesome! Cleans so much better & faster then the cheap little one that I had. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The more dense and narrow side works the best
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this is a waste of money but it isn't the best you could buy. I tried both sides on my brushes and for the dense and narrow side works really well while the wide side barely does anything. The rods also bend easily and so far one has broken which can be a hazard if you have young kids that might eat it if they find it on the floor. Because the one side works so well, I won't return it but, as I said, there are better out there.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hair brush cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic hair brush cleaner! I was amazed how easy it was to use and also how brand new looking it left my hairbrushes! Well worth the money in restoring my expensive hairbrushes back to new condition!!! I supplied before and after pictures!
customer_reviews.author: LCL1966

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use it regularly!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my volumizer and it's great! The only thing I don't like is that it's scary. I'm afraid of scratching my wrists so you have to be mindful of how you hold it. Also, the metal things are strong together, but sometimes one might bend out of place , it's annoying, but overall, this has great functionality!
customer_reviews.author: This_reader

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this once on one brush but it worked really well. Took about 10 minutes because the brush is several years old and prior cleanings just didn't do much good. The wires on the wide end cleaned the hair from bristles really well and the narrower end pulled out all of the buildup of hair products (some referred to as lint) that stick to the bristles. A combination of running water and the brush cleaner towards the end finished cleaning the brush so that it looked as clean as new. If it holds up, my review will remain a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Mugwa6

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous cleaning hair brush tool!
customer_reviews.text: Actually love it! Replaced one we purchased 30 years ago from Fuller Brush Company; it just plain worn itself out! I only gave four stars because nothing is EASY with these type items to clean 😉 Love having a new one and this is fantabulous with two not one ends really does what it is intended for....
customer_reviews.author: Twain

customer_reviews.title: I'd rinse it in warm soapy water and I thought that was fine. The first time I ran this through
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even know my hairbrush could look this clean! I was always cleaning my hairbrush with a comb to get the old hair out. I'd rinse it in warm soapy water and I thought that was fine. The first time I ran this through.... it was like magic! I couldn't believe it was the same brush. I absolutely love this tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Borkstrom

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This item was recommended to me for cleaning wool and fiber out of my wool processing equipment. Specifically my carder, it does not disappoint. Wish I’d known about this jewel of a tool a long time ago. Finally - I could get that yak fiber out of the blending board! I use this frequently and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Scarpa

customer_reviews.title: Clean Hair Brushes and Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I do not like hair brushes or Velcro rollers to have hair in them. This brush cleaner cleans natural hair bristle brushes, regular hair brushes, and most importantly my Velcro hair rollers. My only recommendation is to be careful with the wire brush cleaners, they are sharp and can surprise you when you poke yourself. I have some of my 30+ Velcro rollers clean.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My expensive boar bristle brush is so hard to clean. This made it like new. The metal cleaning bristles seem flimsy, but I think you need that to really get into a dense brush, it just needs to be stored where it won't get bent up. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ap

customer_reviews.title: No more hair, no more lint!  Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this “whatchamacallit” ! I wish I had gotten one years ago. It cleans my brushes thoroughly and it’s so easy. I use on my vacuum brushes to get the lint out. If you have a dog that sheds you can use it on his/her brush.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Can clean vacuum brushes too!
customer_reviews.text: Buying a 2nd for hair brushes since I was desperate to clean the vacuum and tried this. IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Revi3wer

customer_reviews.title: 💯
customer_reviews.text: This brush cleaner is a God-send. It works very well. It easily combs through and picks up all the hair tangled and wrapped aroundy brushes and combs. So glad I purchased this, every lady needs one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my previous
customer_reviews.text: I had another tool just like this but it did a better job of cleaning out the hair. I am not sure if it has to do with the number of metal teeth or what but it is not as effective or satisfying to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lamby bam

customer_reviews.title: Saves the day for dirty brushes
customer_reviews.text: It does what its supposed to, the wider bristles are not strong, and get bent out of shape easy, but the thinner side is strong and that's what I use to clean all my brushes. Life Saver! No Brush saver!
customer_reviews.author: JrsyGal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality hairbrush cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I bought this! It cleans out all of my hairbrushes perfectly. Even the animal brushes! Although I have one for my own hairbrush and a separate one for the cat and dog brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and Durable so far
customer_reviews.text: I had a tool similar to this (a plastic rake for my brush) but it kept falling apart so I wanted to replace it. This is a perfect replacement!! It exceeds my expectations. It’s easy to use and easy to clean after. So far it feels pretty durable, I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Removing Rug Fibers from Vacuum Cleaner Bristles
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this brush cleaner for a different purpose, not to clean a hairbrush. I use it to remove the fibers and lint from the rug bristle-brush on my vacuum. It works beautifully and removes 100% of the fibers/lint very quickly and easily. Much faster than using a comb to clean the bristles. I'm very happy with the product, and glad I purchased it. It is very sturdy and strong. I'm sure it will last a very long time, maybe longer than me!! Love it. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ChloeB

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap but works really well!
customer_reviews.text: First things first, mine had a bright blue handle, not white as in the photo online. In real life this product looks cheaply made, so I was surprised at how well it works. Using this brush took me a total of 1 minute: 15 seconds to rake my hairbrush with the big side, 15 seconds to rake my hairbrush with the smaller / finer side, and then 30 seconds to clean the brush cleaner itself. It works better than anything else I've tried to clean my hairbrush with. I highly recommend this product in order to extend the life of your hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Inman

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to my vanity
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to clean my brushes. A fine tooth comb wasn’t working so I was so glad to find something like this. I use it several times a week. The bristles are fragile and can bend a bit but it still works. Just be gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: ever1111

customer_reviews.title: Hairstylist’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thing! I actually enjoy cleaning out all my hair brushes at the salon now, even the apprentices and front desk girls like to do it for me when I don’t have time. They think it’s fun. Very easy to use and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Now This is a Brush Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Now This is a Brush Cleaner. This is the best brush and combine cleaner. It's big enough to clean medium to large brushes without having to go over them a million times. The spacing of the wire bristles on both sides is very effective. The ergonomic handle makes this product a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Not So Secret Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does What It’s Suppose To
customer_reviews.text: kind of large and an unwieldy shape but that’s inherent in being effective at what it does. Nice long prongs to rake out brushes of all sizes and smaller tines packed closely together to get in between hard to reach places. Nice grip so easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: McLean

customer_reviews.title: Going to buy more for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Love this! A friend recommended it. Before I was using a comb to get hair out of my brush but this thing beats a comb. Love it and now my hair brush doesn't look like I just brushed big foot!
customer_reviews.author: zorrone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product - removes that yucky hair brush lint!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean a favorite brush and it did a great job & was so easy to use. I had a super nasty, yucky brush & decided to give it a go. I should have taken a before photo - this little doohickey cleaned all the yucky crusty lint out a brush that I was about to write off as too yucky & toss out. 5 Stars- it did was it said it would do and better than expected. Be sure to use the appropriate end of the brush you are cleaning. There are photos of the back of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Hs saved me hours each month since I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I have spent soooooo much time trying to clean crap out of brushes, like days waisted over the years.....and this tool turns it into seconds! It's so stupid its smart! If you have to have clean brushes without all the gunk please buy one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lives to shop!

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning drum carders
customer_reviews.text: I also use it to clean out velcro so it sticks better.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This makes it so easy to clean the hair out of the brushes. It made the brushes look brand new and took no time at all. Easier than replacing the brushes. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AliM

customer_reviews.title: Best brush cleaner for drum carder!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly!! I bought this as a tool to clean my drum carder (used for carding fibers to make fiber batts for spinning yarn), and it is THE BEST for cleaning it! Any other tool I tried would damage the teeth of the drum carder or would take me about 10 minutes when trying to get ever bit of fiber out. But with this tool, I am quickly able to clean the whole drum carder in a minute or under. It’s stellar.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Glauninger

customer_reviews.title: Saves my fingers
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tool. Easy to use and clean. I’m not as inclined to take so long to clean a brush. I still have to remember I don’t have to use my hand or a comb to clean my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very effective tool I didn’t know I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning out my brushes have gotten so much easier since I bought this tool. It works great on regular brushes and boar bristle brushes.
customer_reviews.author: tellis

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret getting this item!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool for cleaning my hairbrushes! Best tool ever. It was recommended to me by my hairstylist. Very very pleased with how it picks out the hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This tool is so helpful, hair stylists best friend! If you do a lot of blow outs or brush styling, you can clean your brushes very fast! Love this hair remover!
customer_reviews.author: Henry H

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this little tool! It's handy and nifty, and works very well. After using this for the first time, you will wonder how you ever lived without it. You know how you use your comb to clean out your brushes sometimes, but it takes forever? This saves you from wasting time trying to clean hairs out of your brush, or giving up and throwing the hair filled brush out entirely. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: zoe's mum

customer_reviews.title: cleans metal bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a metal bristle brush and it works well. The big side is for scooping long hair and the small side is for lint, but the lint is not completely removed so I pour dish liquid on the brush and power-spray it for a minute and that does remove the remainder of the lint.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Rose

customer_reviews.title: An Unusual But Handy Tool!
customer_reviews.text: We like this tool so much that we plan to purchase several as stocking stuffers for our family, next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rose

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT YOU DIDNT KNOW YOY NEEDED!!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have this product don’t walk but run and order this product! You won’t know how you lived without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Cleans my brushes like new
customer_reviews.text: This cleans my hair brushes so well. They look brand new after I use it. I wish I knew about it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at the salon I go to and decided to get it. At first I thought it was pricey for what it is, but it is well made and works great for cleaning hair out of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: LiteraryBiz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean to the bristle heads on my dyson vacuum. My wife has long hair and we have a dog that sheds a ton so I need to clean my vacuum after each use. i know it's for hairbrushes but if you constantly need to clean your vacuum roller like I do this brush cleaner will do a perfect job in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little thingamabob
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little thingamabob! Just wonderful. Ugly packaging. Would have liked it to have been in a plastic protector or shell. This goofy looking thing works like a charm. I'm not losing this for anything in the world. This is the kind of goodie that all your friends & family we'll "borrow" and never want to return. It sounds strange but if you give this to someone as a gift this will soon turn into that favorite gift they can't imagine living without.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is handy and makes getting all of the hair and debris out of your hair brushes fast & easy. The 2 different sides are nice, for various size hair brushes. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Marie

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for cleaning my brushes, it doesn't remove 100% of the tiny dust and build-up though. But good enough to remove most of the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Lok

customer_reviews.title: No more hairy brushes
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than the combs I was using. Review is for Brush Cleaner 2-1 tool
customer_reviews.author: Texgal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hairbrush Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I found something that pulls all of that yucky hair from my hairbrushes and makes them look like brand new!
customer_reviews.author: awesome game!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled FOREVER cleaning my hair brushes. I asked my hairdresser what she does and she recommended this brush cleaner. I love it, and if it’s sturdy enough for her too use on a daily basis in her salon, you know it’s sturdy. Getting my hairbrush clean is so quick and easy now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jennyloves2teach

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you have brushes that get dirty or have a ton of hair in them, this is the gadget for you. It takes all the funk out of your brush.
customer_reviews.author: j.zies

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this years ago
customer_reviews.text: I had years of buildup on my brushes that I never seemed to be able to remove prior, but this helped remove it all! very effective!
customer_reviews.author: EGKitty

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning your brushes
customer_reviews.text: this thing takes out every hair out of my 1983 boar bristle brush. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Susanhv

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: There might be a better product out there but i haven’t found it. I have no problems now cleaning my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: EZELLA001

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite hair brushes was starting to get full of hair as well as dust. This got my brush clean in a matter of minutes! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karisa Brake

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. My brushes look like new when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: sfdee

customer_reviews.title: Practical problem solver
customer_reviews.text: Used one of these many years ago & was delighted to find the new, improved version. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: She's Sandy on a beach

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Why haven’t I had one of these before!!! So worth the money. I can finally easily clean my brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Things2Buy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: had this at the salon i worked at so i bought one for myself works great
customer_reviews.author: asucena mosqueda

customer_reviews.title: Works well, can scratch though
customer_reviews.text: The smaller end works best, removing hair and lint trapped in brushes. Be careful, it is easy to scratch your brush if you are too vigorous in pursuit of the elusive lint stuck deep within the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be alarmed
customer_reviews.text: At first it appeared to be just a gimmick. A tool to do what I was already doing with other brushes. But once I figured out the best way to use, short strokes from top to bottom it worked. Satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it all my brushes are clean now
customer_reviews.author: Tattooedredhead_666

customer_reviews.title: Tools
customer_reviews.text: Great hair tool cleans brushes with out a lot of mess
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it’s not the color that I wanted very disappointed The whole reason I wanted it was because of the color so I can match with the rest of my accessories
customer_reviews.author: Ty Lopez

customer_reviews.title: This brush cleaner is fantastic. I'm so glad I bought this particular brush ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush cleaner is fantastic. I'm so glad I bought this particular brush cleaner. My husbands brush was so ichy I was afraid to clean it. But with this brush cleaner it was a breeze. It also cleaned my dogs comb. It's fantastic. I recommend this cleaner to anyone who needs a real down to earth brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondJane

customer_reviews.title: Clean hairbrush in a cinch!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and it cleans ANY brush effectively and quickly! I don’t think I’ve EVER been able to fully clean out the hair in my round brushes or any brushes I’ve owned until NOW! Absolutely a must have if you want a clean hairbrush!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A surprise
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't think I would like this as much as I do. It's great
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Jean

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it claims. I've had no trouble cleaning out my thick hair from my hair brushes. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Delmotte

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I am a very busy stylist and this really comes in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Debra F.

customer_reviews.title: Spinning carding machine cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice for cleaning it my carders for spinning fibers.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Works for hair
customer_reviews.text: This was bigger than I was expecting, although I don't know if the size is in the description and I just missed it, but it's about 9" long. It works well to get the hair out, but I was hoping for something to get the little lint/dust pieces and get around each bristle and it didn't really do that.
customer_reviews.author: April Rabe

customer_reviews.title: I found that the fatter and was useless. But the thinner and is great
customer_reviews.text: I found that the fatter end was useless. But the thinner end is great
customer_reviews.author: ADEM T. THYNE

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked better- & faster - than I imagined anything could. Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi S

customer_reviews.title: good hairbrush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: great for all the hair brushes. really gets all of the hair out.
customer_reviews.author: dolanz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this product. I was skeptical, but it is so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, gets the hair out of brush, then too hard to get the hair off the cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Sandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible hair or beard brush cleaner,
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned all my beard brushes and wife hair brush, now look and feel new
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Sanger

customer_reviews.title: I just love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush cleaner, it’s just what I wanted! It takes the hair out of all my brushes and I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Poodle

customer_reviews.title: been using this a lot cleaning hair brushes, vaccume ...
customer_reviews.text: been using this a lot cleaning hair brushes, vaccume beater bar scrub brushes, anything with brushes esspeically things used for cleaning, I have too cats and have long hair myself.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when i first saw this product. After reading the great reviews, i decided to try it out. After using it a few times, I have to agree with all the other reviewers. It definitely cleans your brush with little effort and it looks like it should last you a long time. it doesn't look breakable at all. If you have problems getting the hair out of all your brushes, then this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: not bad if your on a budget
customer_reviews.text: It is not bad of a product. It does take off some of the gunk from my hair brushes. The metal used is not the best its easily bendable so it is not able to throughly clean my brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Desteny A Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser had one and I had been looking for one and finally found it on Amazon. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lefty's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does not take the fuzz out of brush as described.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Only downside is the wires bend and fall out fairly easily, so it will probably need replacing periodically
customer_reviews.text: Works very effectively removing hair from brushes, particularly when used frequently. Only downside is the wires bend and fall out fairly easily, so it will probably need replacing periodically. That said it is very reasonably priced and not much of a deterrent given how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TOOL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS TOOL! Get the hair out of my brushes so easily! no more damaging other brushes to get them clean! GET THIS YOU WON'T REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job right!
customer_reviews.text: At the suggestion of my hair gal I got one of these to clean hair out of my round brushes. It works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tool of Gods
customer_reviews.text: I never write product reviews. However, this product is great. It cleans my brush so fast and I don’t need to scrape the gunk off each individual bristle with my fingers anymore. This person is sitting on a gold mine. Where has this product been all my life? I’m inclined to buy more and give them as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Seibert

customer_reviews.title: A ‘must have’ tool. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair and have to clean my brushes almost daily. This is a ‘must have’ tool. Good quality and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Zorichak

customer_reviews.title: Really does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different brush cleaners but this one is definitely the best.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Granny

customer_reviews.title: I think my mother used to have a product like this - now I know why
customer_reviews.text: I think my mother used to have a product like this - now I know why. It does a great job removing hair from expensive nylon tip brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Hag

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog's brush
customer_reviews.text: Works well to get hair out of a brush with traditional soft bristles. Great for my dog's brush. Does not get rid of the fuzzies that accumulate at the base of each bristle. What is that stuff: oil and dust?
customer_reviews.author: Reader Mom

customer_reviews.title: This Brush Cleaner works on All sizes & Types of Hair Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I was this at my Salon and was able to get it much Cheaper. It works on all Sizes and types of brushes. I highly recommend this hair brush cleaner. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned my Drum Carder and Hand Cards fine
customer_reviews.text: This brush cleaner worked great in cleaning the little bits out of my Drum Carder and Hand Cards.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I found that this product did not work very well on my wet brush. Unsure if it would be better suited for other brushes but not that one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Walther

customer_reviews.title: love it. i tell all my stylist friends to ...
customer_reviews.text: helps keep my brushes in tip top shape. love it. i tell all my stylist friends to get one. will continue to buy this brand throughout my career.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Castañeda Mochulsky

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hairbrush tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works like a dream. The only issue is pulling the hair/fuzz out of the comb once you’ve gotten it out of the brush,
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Great care for brushes
customer_reviews.text: Keeps brushes clean. Just wish it was better at removing dry shampoo build up!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: It really works to get all the hair out of your brushes including the little fuzz balls that gather at the base of the bristles. Then you can clean your brush by your preferred method. It's very sturdy and seems like it will last for years. This is easy and almost fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: N. Ro
